wikipedia_page.main: Julian Halls (born 17 April 1967) is a British former field hockey player who competed in the 1996 Summer Olympics and in the 2000 Summer Olympics. He represented England and won a bronze medal in the men's hockey, at the 1998 Commonwealth Games in Kuala Lumpur. He played club hockey in the Netherlands for Haagsche Delftsche Mixed.

response: * Julian Halls (born 1967), British field hockey player
